title: Ticket #3941: if executable invalid exe, job gets rerun forever on windows
description:
If the executable for windows is not in exe format, the starter knows this and disconnects. Shadow does not know why it disconnected and will reschedule the job forever.

With a bogus text file named foo

and this submit file 

executable = foo
log = foo.log
queue

When you submit this file and tail foo.log you'll see this behaviour
